title: Urza's Saga
desc:
Post 384
- __On each player's first turn after Urza's Sagais played, they may change one of their cards into a random card with a positive effect.__
- __On each player's second turn after Urza's Saga is played, they may change two of their cards with a positive effects into **1**s with no effects. If they do, they may play an additional number of cards this turn equal to the number of <:colorless:1106434944261177374> cards in every player's hand plus the play pile.__
- __On each player's third turn after Urza's Saga is played, they may choose a <:colorless:1106434944261177374> card from the cards thread and play it in addition to their card this turn.__
